column2: Project funding agreements (PFAs) signed by the NS and the IFRC no longer than 7 days from the DREF approval
column3: After PFA is signed by both parties, HoD/project manager to process the Request for Payment to be sent to Treasury within 10 days of DREF approval
column4: Bank transfer process by IFRC to the NS within 24h after the request for payment is received/approved
column5: Confirmation from the NSs of the funds received to be obtained within 3 working days from the value date of the transfer
column6: First round of payment received to the target beneficiaries four weeks after the DREF approval - 1 Month (Date)
column7: First round of payment received to the target beneficiaries four weeks after the DREF approval l - 2 Months (%)
column8: First round of payment received to the target beneficiaries four weeks after the DREF approval - 3 Month (%)
